mapper.select: select P.personal_statement_no , P.home_environment , P.pros_and_cons , P.experiance , P.job_espirations , P.regdate from ( select P.*, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY P.PERSONAL_STATEMENT_NO DESC) rownum from PERSONAL_STATEMENT P order by P.PERSONAL_STATEMENT_NO desc LIMIT #{amount} OFFSET #{startRownum} ) P
